# Changelog

All notable changes to publicdata_ca will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]

### Added
- Comprehensive documentation for all data providers
- CMHC troubleshooting guide
- Advanced features documentation
- PyPI-ready package configuration
- Changelog for version tracking

### Changed
- Streamlined README to focus on getting started quickly
- Moved detailed provider documentation to separate files
- Moved CMHC troubleshooting to dedicated guide
- Updated examples to use modern Provider pattern

### Improved
- Documentation organization and discoverability
- Getting started experience for new users
- PyPI package metadata

## [0.1.0] - 2024-01-10

### Added
- Initial release
- StatCan data provider
- CMHC data provider with landing page resolution
- Open Canada (CKAN) provider
- Generic CKAN provider
- Socrata provider
- SDMX provider
- Bank of Canada Valet provider
- HTTP caching with ETag/Last-Modified support
- Provenance tracking with metadata sidecar files
- Profiles system for dataset collections
- Normalization utilities for Canadian data
- Command-line interface
- Comprehensive test suite
- Example scripts for all providers

[Unreleased]: https://github.com/ajharris/publicdata_ca/compare/v0.1.0...HEAD
[0.1.0]: https://github.com/ajharris/publicdata_ca/releases/tag/v0.1.0
